Merge_ScreamDuration.Description: The duration the scream effect remains active when a survivor merges with a vecna artifact

LockerShimmerMaximumDistance.Description: The maximum distance a survivor can be from a locker for the cosmetic shimmer effect to appear when the teleportation power can be used.

TimeWindow_OpenLockerSmokeVFXEffect.Description: The time window the killer has to open the locker to see the vfx on the locker after an artifact power is triggered on it

BrokenDurationAfterTriggeringArtifactPow.Description: The duration (in seconds) that the survivor triggering the power of the artifact will be broken for.

Eye_MergeInteraction_ChargeDuration.Description: The charge time required for the merge interaction to complete.

Eye_Invisibility_KillerInstinctDuration.Description: The duration of the killer instinct effect that is triggered at the end of the invisibility effect. (if the survivor is still healthy)

Eye_Invisibility_EffectDuration.Description: The duration of the invisibility effect that is triggered on the survivor

Eye_Invisibility_PreEndEffectTrigger_Tim.Description: The amount of seconds that is deducted from the total invisibility effect time to trigger the pre end invisibility effect

Eye_Invisibility_HastePercentageIncrease.Description: The percentage increase of the haste effect applied on the survivor while invisible.

Eye_Invisibility_AfterInvisibleVFXMateri.Description: ! VFX ONLY ! The time the after inivisible status effect remains on a survivor to allow VFX to alter the survivor material.

Hand_MergeInteraction_ChargeDuration.Description: The charge time required for the merge interaction to complete.

Hand_Teleportation_LockerAuraDuration.Description: The time the locker aura will be active on the originating locker or target locker (depending on survivor/killer perspective)

Hand_Teleportation_MinimumDistanceToLock.Description: The minimum distance a locker needs to be from the source locker for it to be taken into consideration to be a teleportation target.

Hand_Teleportation_KillerInstinctDuratio.Description: The amount of time the Killer instinct will linger on the survivor once the teleportation is completed

Hand_Teleportation_LoudNoiseMaximumDista.Description: The maximum distance the loud noise can be heard from the killer's perspective. (Loud noise that triggers on the locker the survivor teleports to)
